title: About Us
subtitle: A smart airport hotel built for modern travel.
storyContent:
The Aura Inn is designed for guests who value comfort, speed, and confidence. With AI-powered assistance, seamless airport pickups, and instant communication, your stay becomes effortless from arrival to checkout.

Whether youâ€™re traveling for business, transiting through the city, or planning a short luxury escape, we combine premium interiors with smart systems to deliver a professional 5-star experience.
